title: Six Fellows: A Story of Friendship and Survival
description: This is the adventure story of six teenage boys, united together through hardship and chance. Their good character, creativity and courage withstand all sorts of trials for the triumph of their strong friendship. “We are not bad kids; we wouldn’t steal and hide if we didn’t have to. We all dream of a second chance, but deep down we doubt we’ll ever get one.”
author: Andrei Daniel Proca
